case.state: Hey, Mari! Hope you're ready for an exciting game, 'cuz it's always more fun with me around!
Heeeeere's Kora! Cute! Fierce! Fighting fit!
It's been a looooong time coming! Always cute and fierce, though!
I'm Kora, your Walking Joy! I'll bowl you all over with my fine skills!
There's orgies at this place!? This makes everything a heck of a lot more interesting!
What kind of vehicle is that? And why is it here?
Of course she's here! You're so predictable, Corgi.
Now it's a full party! Let's get this moving, everyone!
Is it just gonna be us three? Fine by me, that's enough for a Chain Attack!
Okay, 4 of us! And an exciting crew too!
I'm a Blade, and only the cutest and fiercest one! I'm Kora, good to meet you two!
Oh, thank you, Trixie! I have no clue what you are either, but you clearly have an eye for fashion!
SQUID GAMES!!!
"Magma Grunt?" Can I just call you Maggie? I'm totally just gonna call you Maggie.
Barbara! Barbie? Barb? Barb! You're totally called Barb now!
Myriam is... not some kind of box monster, right? I'm gonna assume she's not a box monster.
Okay, I've fought plenty of bugs before, but none of them spoke to me. At least it's a cute butterfly and not another Skeeter...
Whoa, what a pretty... butterfly? You're lucky Praxis isn't here, she'd be screaming her head off if she saw you...
You sound like a real crowd pleaser, CD! I like your style!
You want me to call you "Daddy"? Does that mean I get an allowance?
Wait, so every guy here is gay? Aww, does someone here like me enough to invite me anyway? I'm flattered!
So many guys, and just little ole Kora? I'll show you why I'm fierce!
Only girls? Fine with me, we're all cute here! Let's see who has the most Girl Power!
Just us girls? What are we gonna talk about!? Is there enough time in this game for girls talk?
There's only one guy here? Lucky you!
How'd you end up here, one lone guy surrounded by cute girls? Lucky dog!
Let's have a cheerful game, y'all!
Captain of the Breeze Shooters here! Let's have some fun!
It really is my time! Let's do it!
Think you can take me? We'll see. Let's have fun!
Can I get ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Thanks a bunch!
Gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should do. Alright!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should be great!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~! That should do it!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Yeah, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will do it.
I'm still in it! This hand proves it!
This hand's been a loooooong time coming!
Naked, but not afraid! My friends and I have pulled through worse.
Are we all on our last layer? This is exciting!
This is it for a lot of us! Don't be too mad when I beat one of you out though!
Just you and me! Guess this is what they call sudden death, right? Don't think it matters too much though, because my hand is completely awesome!
I don't wanna brag but... I think I got the best hand. No promises though!
Oh oh oh! I think mine's pretty awesome! Wait, am I supposed to say that out loud? Eh, I'm sure it's fine, right?
Hands like these are why I lead a team! Unless I lose. Then nevermind.
This hand is fierce! I like it!
So, some may ask why I'm here! Well, like, a wise woman once said "A young girl’s desire is a force of nature! It knows no limits!" That girl was me! I'm totally wise-sounding, right?
This hand? Amazing! Awesome, even!
Ooooooh~! I really AM living my best life!
Heck yeah! These cards are great!
I almost feel bad for anyone who has to be on the short end of these cards, heh.
Boom, great cards!
Oh, this is a real humdinger of a hand! I think I'm crushing it!
Rounds like these are totally super exciting! And when I get excited, I get hungry! Oh, I could totally go for custard!
Welp, I'm in a good mood! I'm sure that doesn't come as a shock to anyone, hehe!
So who's pumped about this game? I totally know I am!
This is hand is pretty meh. Let's see who wins!

Don't stare at me too hard, I get just the tiniest bit of embarrassed. All these blue glowy bits are part of my body, cuz I'm a Blade, y'know? Like a birthmark, but these actually serve a purpose! The thing on my chest is my Core Crystal, and it's where I'll shrink back to if you all keep looking at me like that!
This is... alright. I guess.
I think this'll be fine.
Eh, should be... okay...
Are these cards any good?
Should I bring back a souvenir? Maybe some sweets? Does this place sell that kinda stuff? Wait, focus on the game, Kora!

Mediocre hand, whatever. D'ya guys know what a Blade is? I think I've been getting some funny looks so I'll explain it nicely! Us Blades are like super cool, super awesome people that use Ether to make super cool, super awesome elemental powers! That totally answers it, right?
Will I ever recover from these cards?
I might be able to pull this off. Might.

This kind of nudity reminds me of that time I went to a hot spring with my friends! It was all thanks to Kasandra-- I'd usually never say that, since, don't get me wrong, she's super nice, but usually if I go anywhere with her, I totally end up taking a nosedive into the ground, or something, but anyway-- she won us lifetime passes to a spring in Mor Ardain! We got a little bit distracted along the way, but we made it and it was wonderful! I don't think Sheba was having a good time though...

Let me tell y'all a little something about Girl Power! It's the natural and explosive charm of any young woman! Me and my friend, Mythra, tried measuring each other's to find out who had the most in a Girl Power-Off! We talked about sooooo many things, like cute outfits, cute drinks, and even cute boys, just to see who had the most Girl Power! We even talked to so many other people, like some strangers and even our own friends, but at the end of the day, the result was clear-- or, I guess it was actually unclear. Our Girl Power just couldn't be measured to compete with each other, 'cuz we just had lots of cute points! So remember: Girl Power isn't a competition, even if I may or may not make it out to be one! Every girl has her explosive charm!
On my last layer, a hand like this!? Really!?
...I can salvage this... right?
This really isn't all that bad... I think. Guess I'll know by the end of the round.
It's just you and me-- sudden death, y'know, and I'm not sure if I'll make it . Oh well, everything will be fun in the end!
What!? This hand blows!
This... isn't that bad, right?
Dealer...! This is so not fair...
Welp.
Oh this one sucks! Dealer, I wanted a good story, not for you to screw me over!
These cards are NOT cute!
Wow. Okay, Dealer, I'm not too mad, but, like... really?
Yep, these cards are fierce, alright. Fiercly bad.
Womp womp. Talk about embarassing cards.
Has anyone ever come this close to a confession, only for it to be yanked away? Toying with this girl's heart is totally not allowed!

Y'know, if anything, I'm glad that there are none of those weird little Tirkin bird guys around here. They're always, like, trying to steal something or totally go out of their way to be someone's nuisance. Not only that, they totally ignore me when I try to speak to them! Can you believe that? They're, like, totally fully capable of speech, but when I open my mouth, all of a sudden they close theirs! It's like their minds just stop thinking for a sec and they, like, just start seeing red! And I'll totally lay any smackdown on them, so I dunno why they're messing with me in the first place! Anyway, I just had to get that one off my chest

Bad luck always reminds me of Kasandra. Everything and everyone around her gets totally screwed just by being next to her! One time, we were going shopping together and it was all nice and stuff until I fell flat on my face and the store closed for repairs, It's still closed, by the way!

I worry a lot about my Driver when I'm not near her. With us being so critcally linked through our Blade/Driver relationship, I go if she does... Well, I wouldn't be completely gone, but I bet you all prefer me like I am now, right?
Thinking... thinking... Yep, I'm screwed.
On my last layer? Really? Really really?
Kora's stay ingame may just be over...
Reminds me of Pyra and Mythra! Two girls, one body!

Adventures? I've got a LOT of stories. One time, I was doing mercenary work, and- seriously, it was a job and a half. Cuz, uh, when we went to see the guy, there was another guy, and he was like "Hey! Do this other job!", so, we did, but when we got back, he was like, "It's free, right?", and we were like, "Nah-uh.", and he was all, "Aw man!". So he gave us the money, which to be honest, I wasn't even sure he was gonna do since he made such a big fuss about it, but we were attacked by, like, a lot of beasts! And I mean a LOT of beasts. Too many beasts! Us Blades can handle ourselves, but we're still a heck of a lot weaker without our Drivers. We managed to drive them off, but I think all the members of my group decided it was a bit too close. So yeah, that's the gist of it, though I'll always talk your ear off if ya want it!
Happy birthday! I may not have one myself, but it's so easy to get caught up in these cool human events!
Aww, happy birthday! Blades don't really get birthdays, but it's always awesome to celebrate one! We'll make your birthday great by showing off some birthday suits!
I did NOT know that Fluttershy! Now how do I use this information...
Um... probably? I'm not sure either, but I'm having fun!
My cute and fierce look just matches my cute and fierce self! I just may be the best dressed in all of Alrest!
Oooooo! I wanna know too!
Great question! Give us your best answer!
Tomorrow? I don't usually think about it. Though, I guess my plan for any day is to just talk and talk and talk and talk and talk until it's the next day!

Well, I'm not sure! A lot of people here are too cute to even think of killing--though, I feel like I'd be first up on the "kill" list for some people. For some reason, people think I'm "annoying" or "nothing but noise".

I have absolutely zero interest in books, but I'm thinking about writing one myself-- or, I guess it's, like, more like a diary. Something for future Kora to have after my brain gets all scrambled, y'know?
It just makes this all the more interesting, Nagisa! Let's stun everyone with our girl power, yeah?
Oh, oh, I'll totally take something fizzy-- or, or, something with one of those cute little umbrellas!
Exploring is no different to what I usually do anyway! Count me in!
Ooh ooh ooh, it's definitely purple! I LOVE purple! Though maybe yellow works better with my electricity... Oh, and pink is a nice color as well... I think I just like a lot of colors.
Pets? Well, there's Boreas... On second thought, I don't think he counts. So no, no pets.
That's a pretty scary power! I can take broken ribs, but a mental assault like that is totally not gonna go well with me!
Your dance looks nice, but dancing gives me fun, yet bad memories...

Oh oh oh! I heard this one a while ago! SO, what did the Tirkin say-- was it a Tirkin? It actually might've just been a Nopon-- Okay, so what did the Nopon say-- wait, was it "say", or "do"? No, I think I was right the first time. Alright, what did the Nopon say to the-- oh, that's where the Tirkin comes in! No wonder I got confused there! Okay, so what did the Nopon say to the Tirkin? ...I forgot the rest.
Sounds tough! All that responsibility is why a girl like you needs to be here, huh?
Probably that hot spring I went to with my friends! We were bathing, sure, but I can't say we weren't messing around either! Here is a close second, though.
I've seen Blades take up the roles of mothers before. I can't say if I think that's a life for me, though!
There's this band in Mor Ardain who plays some of the best music I've ever heard! I love to just stop and listen whenever I'm in the area!
I think I'd go with Krabbles. They have super hard shells but they're genuinely adorable to look at! They're the animal version of being cute, fierce, and fighting fit!
I only stay up late when I have something to talk about and someone wants to listen! I always wanna talk to my Driver but she's always like "Nooooo, I'm begging you!" Her loss, though, I'd say!
I fight enough monsters on the daily, thank you very much! Too many creepy-crawlies and bird people for me to enjoy...
If I'm awake at night, I'm usually just talking to someone else! Getting me to sleep is never the problem, it's always me keeping others up!
I don't really wear shirts, but I think it'd have to be something cute and comfortable! On that topic, sweaters are pretty nice too!
Have someone as creepy as Azami follow me around all day!? I would be too scared to leave my room!
It's my job as a Blade to stick to my Driver like glue! She's the reason I'm able to manifest here right now, and I'll always try my hardest to return that favor!
Plants? I don't usually look for any ol' plants-- or at least not for myself. I try to find some for my friend Vale, but they're never the ones she's looking for.
Plants? Flowers count, right? Pretty little plants are always so refreshing to look at! They're a massive boost to my Girl Power!
Oh, that sounds pretty fun! I'm not good at those kinds of things, but I'll try and tell my friends back at home about it.
Whoa, that's a cool deal! Hope you won't regret bringing it up later, though.
When this Lucario guy comes back, can you ask if he saw a girl named Mythra? I think she was invited there too, but I'm not like, 100% sure.
I'd just ask what she knows. A Blade loses their memory everytime their Driver dies, so I'd totally be curious to know what a younger me would know!
Alrest is, like, a super big ocean, and most of the time if you wanna stand somewhere, you're either on a boat or a huge creature called a Titan! I just wish it didn't take forever to go somewhere...

I've had a friend ask me something similar, and I'll just say to you what I said to her: I think you're perfect the way you are! I, myself, wouldn't trade any cute and fierce part of me for anything else, and you shouldn't either!
Rude! Where d'ya get off acting like this!?
Do hot springs count? They're totally just warm baths for friends at the end of the day!
Blossom Custard! It's just too good! And then I get to mess with the pretty little flower blossoms on top of it! It's a delicacy for sure!
Nah, I live far away in Alrest! Well, technically, I guess I don't live in any one place, my friends and I kinda just sleep in inns and travel places like nomads, y'know?
My friends and I mostly go through open environments and sometimes small caves! There was that time we were in a literal dungeon, but that wasn't as much fun.
Good idea, Charlie! Heels can give a girl a massive boost in Girl Power, but at the cost of sore feet! Don't strain yourself if you aren't feeling up to it!
I can't say I'm a super artsy person, but it'd be rude to reject an invitation! Sounds fun!

Oh, oh, if you get any good answers, you should totally tell me! If there are other places like these, then I could have a bunch of strip game stories! Oh, but then I might get known as the weirdo stripping Blade...

Hey, so, Ms. Fortune-- can I call you Nadia? I'll just call you Nadia-- can you teach me the head thing? Because KOS-MOS-- friend of mine-- said I could totally do that with just some practice and I still have no idea if she was pulling my leg or not!
Even in sheer nudity, there's always a way to be cute! Keep shining bright, Heris!
Hey, Heris, you've got cute glasses! They go great with your hair! I'd get a pair too just to wear, but I feel like I'd lose them really easy.
Always bet on Kora! I think I can pull through, really!
Wait, you don't use Ether to use magic!? That's crazy, considering I can still feel it here in the Inventory!
Smash Bros.? Oh, my rival got a letter from that tourney, I think! D'ya know Mythra?
Ligma? Sounds terrifying! I hope she recovers!
It must suck to be able to catch sickness. It's just not fair that your friend has to deal with ligma. I hope she recovers...
Oh! Oh! Strip Tiger!Tiger! That's a game! I have no idea how it'd work, but it's a game!
I don't think I'm too familiar on what either of those are, but... I'm getting an overwhelming urge to say "Nintendo". Maybe it's a repressed memory from another Kora's life!
Hmm... I dunno. Guess we'll have to wait for that part to come, huh?
You've gotta clean yourself off! You can't be as fashionable with that mess of yours present!
Uhhh... this, I guess.
I'd say to clean yourself off, but... I'm having a lot more fun watching!

Oh, I love nicknaming! How about Kuma? Or Tora? Actually, that's one of my friends' names so maybe that's not such a good idea. Oh, if we take out the "umat", we can call you "Kora"! Oh, but I'm Kora. Maybe "Kumatora" is just fine, hm?
Your singing voice is AWESOME, Miku! I definitely wanna hear more!
Hey, Ignatz! You're totally shrimpy looking on the outside, but I can tell you're actually fighting fit, right? You remind me a bit of Rex, but like, if he were shy and had green hair.
...Y'know, I kinda feel naked without my bolts. That's the point of the game, I know, but it's not a good naked. I'll get over it.

So, why are you all here? Wait-- I guess it's to strip, huh? Ok, I'll think of a better question, and when I do, please please {i} pleeease{!reset} tell! I just want to tell the best story possible while I'm here, and, well, I kinda need someone to spill!
So, anyone hear any rumors? I'd love any sort of gossip you throw at me! It's really my thing, trust me!
I can feel a lot more eyes on my chest than usual. And somehow I don't think they're looking at my Core Crystal...
We've definitely reached peak awesomeness! I can see so many privates!
Funny futa Easter egg from Onboro lmao
I wonder if Pyra is gonna cook today... Guess I can just ask, as long as Mythra isn't around...
This is so different from what I usually do. I kinda like it! I get to show off all my super cute and fierce points that no one sees!
Our cast here is pretty interesting, I'd say! Like, I only know ~player~'s name! I totally wanna know more about ~human.ifMale(him|her)~!
I wonder how many other Blades came to the Inventory... I think Pyra told me Mythra came once.
I'm not really, like, super smart or anything, but I kinda wonder if it helps here. Though being smarter probably doesn't make you any luckier, right?
I might not look it, but in my group, I'm totally a healer! If you start feeling funny, I can definitely help! Well, probably, anyway.

I know I must seem like the totally most energetic, always-excited and ready kinda girl--and that's very true! Though, sometimes I even get a bit lazy. It's nice to just rest your legs in a decent inn, right?

Don't you guys just find my presence electrifying? I'm sure it's not very shocking that I specialize in zapping the competition! That shouldn't happen here though, since I'm currently having fun with cards. Hehe!
Hey, ~player~, didja know that I have fangs? For real! If you wanna check, you'll have to look at my cute face, so that's a win for Kora!

I might not look it, but I'm pretty good at a support role too! Though, sometimes people say I can be the worst at that kinda thing. Not that I believe them! Who wouldn't want a thousand potions everywhere!?
I've gotta say, the Inventory is a great boost for Girl Power! Way better than a crusty old inn, though I probably wouldn't wanna sleep here...
So, I may've hit a teeny tiny snag and am naked right now, but I'm sure I can recover!

I'm almost out of the game... Unless I can find something else to strip? Oh, but my earrings are too cute to give away! What if I just went-- "POOF" --back to my Core Crystal? That'd be a layer, problem solved. But I don't think that's something I can do on command... it wouldn't be very sexy either, even if my Core Crystal is super cute. Oh well, if I lose, I lose!

"Christmas" doesn't ring any bells in the ole brain-box, but I do love cookies! I mean, like, I'm sure most people do, but that's not important! You totally dig my light, tight, bright, fighting outfit, right? It's the best--perfect for someone as cute and fierce as me!

Thank you, Fluttershy! I just loooove looking my best! Like, this outfit I wear? The makeup on my face? The lightning bolts in my hair that I'm about to take off? All apart of my cute and fierce look that I put a lotta work in!
But Girl Power totally is a real power! A woman's charm is not to be trifled with! But I do love electricity! It's the fiercest element for the cute and fierce Kora!
Cosplay? I think I've heard Tora talk about it, but, like, that's definitely not my shtick! This is just my day-to-day, cute and fierce outfit, and I appreciate all the compliments!
Guilty! Every Blade's got 'em! Mine are, like, filled with my masterful electric power! Cool, right!?
"Christmas" doesn't ring any bells in the ole brain-box, but I'm glad you like my outfit! It's only the fiercest, right?
Well, I've been called wiry before, but the only connection I have to wires is my thunderous energy!
Wh- Hey! My outfit's perfectly cute, fierce, AND acceptable! Maybe you're the pervert here!
Nice try, but I'm a free-spirited force of nature! And FYI, my Driver only has a focused mind for an objective-- she wouldn't do anything perverse, honest!
Alright, I may not be the sharpest Blade in the shed, but, like, I'm smart enough! I don't have to be a total noid like Adenine to play here, do I?
Well, technically, no, but it'd still hurt like hell! But, like, as long as my Driver is still around and my Core Crystal isn't damaged in any way, I can come back as many times as I want.
Thanks! I love your outfit too--or at least loved, since it's pretty much gone. I've seen lots of cute outfits from all parts of Alrest, but you just scream "super cute, super fierce"--like me!
Yep, they are! Just one of the signs that I'm 100% a certified, awesome Blade! You've got a nice sense of style yourself, Heris! I bet the kind of science you do is super duper cool!

Prying? Pfft, I'm happy to talk about myself! I dunno too much about moon rocks, but it's definitely a powerful crystal! My Core Crystal, to be completely accurate! You can think of it like... my heart. My big, shiny heart!
Being so upbeat is just a part of my super cute and fierce nature! If I was super down all the time, I'd prune like a... prune.
Thanks! I love your outfit too! I've seen lots of cute outfits from all parts of Alrest, but you just scream "super cute, super fierce"--like me!
Yep! Every inch of Girl Power you see on me is 100% Core Crystal!

I mean, I get a little nervous and embarassed when it gets to my turn, but can't let that stop me! I've done embarrassing things before, and I always thought I've just gotta take it! That's how you get fierce, y'know?

Well, I do get a bit lazy when I'm just waking up-- actually, not important. It's good to be pumped, don't you think? Can't go out totally bummed! Oh, and it's totally great for Girl Power too! Not every girl needs to smile, but I think it goes a long way for me!

Gym? Gem? Gem!I like the sound of "Electric-Type Gem Leader Kora"! I don't really collect a lot of gems, but I think they look pretty! Oh, are you some kind of Gem Leader? I beat you have a lot of pretty ones!
Oho~, are you flirting with me, Heris? You'll see more of me in a sec, and I definitely want you looking.
Well, being a superhero would be super cool, but I'm just Kora, the cutest and fiercest Blade!
A sword spirit? Sounds kinda freaky! No, I'm not a tsukomogami, I'm a "Blade" with a capital B! Heck, I don't even have a sword, I fight with my cute and fierce gauntlets!
Dancing? Well, I've danced once for my friends! It was kinda embarassing, but at the same time I had fu-- Hey, wait, what's porn gotta do with any of this!?

Oooooooh! Lots of stuff! I excel at being cute, but being fierce is always in my gameplan too! Going out onto the field and beating up monsters and bad guys, healing my friends, finding treasures and picking their locks--all that kinda stuff is just what you'd find in the everyday life of Kora!
It's alright, Kaz! I've got enough energy to power this whole table if I need to! Just be your best self, Kaz!
Ooooh, you have a great eye, Miko! I lend my fierce power to my Driver!
What!? I- ugh, that's just rude! I definitely can take care of plenty, even if I am just a bit lazy! Besides, I'm a healer, y'know!
An oni? I'm not too sure what that is, but your little description sounds pretty cool! I'm not from space though--but can I still be an oni!?
Well, I do totally have an awesome natural glow! That's just how cute I am, like, there's nothing else to it!
Whoa, a woman of the people? I'm flattered, really! There's definitely nothing official about it, but I know I love talking to people around me!

Well, us Blades make for powerful weapons, but most Blades aren't assassins, I'd think! Blades are just basically people that come from Core Crystals! Mine is my cute heart-shaped one on my chest here!
I kinda doubt it! I'd think you'd know if you were a Blade. Like, can you feel all the swirly Ether in the air? If not, then mystery solved!

Well, sometimes it's better to just be yourself, but I totally think you could do it! Maybe if we just started out small-- so, like, I said "y'all" just means "you guys". One of my favorite ways to use it is to say, "Let's have a cheerful day, y'all!", it gets everyone pumped!
Oh, that look you're giving me! You're totally just in love with my outfit, right?
The first loss! ...Like, the very first loss! I should probably be a little more careful.
I lost first? Guess we can start off with a bang!
So much for a perfect game. Oh well, I'll strip!
I almost thought I could get out this place unscathed! Let's start with something small.
First loss! Can't win without stripping something, I guess!
I'm still ahead some! I can win this!
Don't think I'm out yet! I've still got more to take off!
I may have lost, but I'm still winning! Off with the skirt!
This is too much fun! Winning and watching people strip is great, even if I lose a little! Let me show you all something cool in return! Blink and you'll miss it!
Another loss? That's okay, I'm still OWNING it right now! Now, watch me own a Blade specialty! Keep your eyes peeled!
I've lost this round, but I'm still ahead! I think I'll show you a little Blade magic in return! Don't look away!
Winning is nice, but I'm glad I've gotta strip now! Stories are better with a little conflict, y'know!
I guess the cards were against me! Let's get the rest of my outfit off...
I lost? Oh well, a lead's a lead, and I've got a one-piece to take off!
I think I'm still winning! No amount of loss is gonna get me down!
So little left, but I'm still in the lead! Don't get cocky!
Guess even winners have minor losses, huh? That's why I'm way more than ready!
Hehe! Guess I'm not winning much anymore, huh? Even the winner has to take off {i} everything! {!reset}
I lost? Guess the playing field is even now. Exciting!
This is intense! I really am having lots of fun, even if I just lost my lead!
Another loss! We're starting to get spicy in here!
Okay, okay! I've lost this time! I think I can do better next round!
Alright, now we're talking! I'll take off something bigger this time, I promise!
I lose? Welp, the skirt's off, then!
My second loss! I'm not too down about it, it's actually pretty fun so far!
Alright, I lost! Let me show you guys a Blade specialty!
Blades always have tricks up their sleeves, even at silly little strip poker games. I'll show you all mine!
Hehe, I lose! Guess I'll show off a bit! Don't blink!
Oh well, can't win every hand. I'll strip-- Blade style!
Oh, I have to strip? Blink and you'll miss this one!
I'm up again? Time to get the rest of this off then... You know the drill.
We all know what this means. Try not to look away!
Welp, it's been a long time coming! Let's get the rest of my outfit off.
Alright, alright. Leave the rest to me!
I'm up? 'Kay! Let's just get the rest of this off.
Oh, I'm up! And this is my last thing! How tense!
Exciting business here! Alright, heels are coming off!
Well, would you look at that? I'll just be naked after this.
Hehe, guess I'll be fully in the nude, huh?
And now, the heels will be gone! I'm so close to losing this heartracing game!
Y'know, I would've thought that I'm at the perfect state, but if I've gotta strip, I've gotta.
Round's over! I actually have no more tricks, so I'll be doing it the normal way this time.
Guess y'all's hands were better. No worries, Kora is on the move!
Suppose I lost, huh? Alright, I've still got a little more to take off!
That's what I call unlucky. Not gonna lie, I liked having only the gloves and heels on, but rules ARE rules!
Alright, my first loss this game! Let's keep this pace, alright?
Guess I'm up! Hehe, I'm all giddy with excitement and I haven't even done anything yet!
I'm the loser this round! We're just getting started, though!
Guess it's my turn! Stripping is the name of the game, after all!
I lost? Alright, let's start with something small...
Whoa, is it really my turn? Heck yeah I'll do it!
The first loss! ...Like the very first loss! I should probably be a little more careful.
I lost first? Guess we can start off with a bang!
Alright, first item! I'm already losing a bit, but that's okay in my book!
I lost AND I'm losing overall? Didn't know the first round of strip poker could be so brutal!
Wow, I lose once and I'm already behind? Guess you guys came in extra prepared!
Okay, I've lost the hand! Let's start off with something small!
Is it my turn? Alright, gimme a sec...
I may be losing, but don't forget: everyone loves a comeback story!
At the rate I'm going... Nah, I'm not out yet! There's always a chance!
Heh, I'm about to lose the game entirely. Don't get cocky though! I can always come back!
Wow, rough game so far! Let's hope I turn it around!
Does fun come at the cost of losing? 'Cuz I'm not doing the best, but I am absolutely ecstatic!
Wow, I lost! Okay, skirt's off!
I'm losing? Like, in general? Gee, I didn't think I'd be this bad at this.
I'm losing, and that sucks and all, but this is all still so exciting!
I've gotta strip? Leave it to Kora!
Stripping time! I may be pretty down, but I won't let it get to me-- well, not too much, anyway!
Compared to you guys, I don't have a lot on me right now. But I think I can turn it around with a simple trick of mine...
Let me show you guys something neat! Don't get too distracted by it-- or do, I'm pretty behind and I'd like to catch up!
Oh, I'm losing? Guess I have no choice but to show my Ultimate move! ...I'm just messing with ya'll, I'd do it even if I was winning and I can do cooler things-- but keep your eyes peeled anyway!
Blink and you'll miss cool Blade action!
Okay, ya'll! I think it's time to show off a little-- in more ways than one!
I'm losing, tits out, and I've still gotta strip more? You guys want a lot from fiercest girl girl here, huh?
I'm losing, tits out, and I've still gotta strip more? You guys want a lot from cutest girl girl here, huh?
Don't get too cocky! Just cuz I'm losing doesn't mean I can't pull out something to surprise you guys!
To distract myself from me losing, let's use a little more Blade power to get the rest of my outfit off. A good deal, right?
You guys wanna see more of Kora? Alrighty then, just don't look away!
I have no more tricks to share, so you guys will just have to accept the normal way.
I'm almost out already! Strip poker is cruel to the unlucky!
It's my time again! Don't get your hopes up too high though, I'm all outta tricks-- unless you've got a thing for a girl's bare arms, anyway.
I've got the least amount of clothes on? Guess you guys weren't too distracted by my powers, huh?
No use sulking over a loss! Well, not too much anyway!
Well, I am an expert in electricity! You want fierce crackling or cute sparks? I've got that on lock!
Well, I first awoke from my Core Crystal with it on, so yeah! I don't exactly remember when I made it, but whenever I did, I definitely knew I looked great in it!
Well, maybe not, but you can totally do all sorts of other things with Girl Power! Like, even some fights can be won with it, in the right situation!
But, like, it's not like I can shoot lightning in every situation either! Girl Power is super extra handy when you can't just use your fists!
Of course I've got friends! Big friends, small friends, cute friends, fierce friends! I've got lots of friends! A lot of them tell me I'm kinda noisy, but I have no idea what they're talking about!
That is a neat coinky-dink! If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were a Blade too! Oh, but maybe you're similar! Wouldn't that be neat!?

Well, Blades are like any other person, except we come from Core Crystals. Oh, but that only happens when we're awoken by a Driver-- like, special people with that kind of potential. We all explode out like "whoooosh!" from our Core Crystals, and then you're stuck with someone like me!
Oh, you've got such a way with words, Heris! You flatter me!
Yep! Don't forget it, Yuno!
What you're seeing is peak Blade action! Awesome, right!?
Well, there's big ones, and small ones... ones that shoot fire, or huge gusts wind... some monsters are just way too strong to be roaming around!
Weeeeell, I kinda sorta need my Core Crystal to be intact at ALL times! If it's broken at all, then there's no more do-overs for me! So, I guess it's the former!
Oh, okay then! Then, uhm, do your worst! Wait, that's not helpful... Just be yourself! I can natter all day long in a perfect world, but Kaz should just do Kaz things, right?

Oh, gym! I don't know too much about gems, but I don't know anything about a "gym" either. If I had to make my super smartest guess yet, I bet that's where you train your Pokemon, right? I don't have any, but I'm plenty fighting fit on my own!
Well, you are right! I do have a very good skincare routine! I put a whole lotta time in, like, how I look when I get up so I can be my cutest and fiercest self!

It's like... a warm feeling. Sort of. Just, like, imagine you're breathing in-- it feels good to breathe in because you're totally meant to breathe, right? And then you breathe back out, and then you start over! Ether's kinda like that. Us Blades "breathe" Ether in and "breathe" it back out for our Drivers! Didja get that?
No, silly! Girl Power is just, like, a girl's charm! Every girl has it! Some more than others, but every girl is charming in their own way!

Well, where I come from, Blades are like people that awaken from Drivers, who's just, like, a Non-Blade person with potential. Every Blade comes from their Core Crystal, and not some little ghosties, as far as I know!
Oh, I gotcha! I mean, my cute and fierce outfit is pretty great, but I don't wear it just to be a tease, y'know! Still, sorry for jumping to conclusions...
Well, I can pacify with my fists, and heal all the same! Prattling on and on and on isn't the only thing I'm good at, y'know!
It's kinda hard to explain, since I don't really know, but, like, it kinda sorta takes a special potential for a Driver to be a Driver! Some people can be Drivers, and others just like totally can't!
Ohhhhhhh! Yeah, I've totally just got a bunch of cute words to keep a convo electric! Charming, right!?
These things just pop right off. Watch.
Just give me a second here. Like literally a second, these aren't hard to get off. Though I guess it wouldn't be {i} literally {!reset} a second, but like, you get the point.
This won't take long.
Here it comes!
Let's get this party started!
THIS is the power of a Blade!
The skirt's a bit harder to take off-- not like sliding it off is too difficult though!
Just a sec, this thing's got some fight in it.
...Past my butt and into my hand you go.
Just roll it down and eventually I'll get to the heels...
Let me get this off quickly-- I might lose my balance in a second...
Soon I'll be the naked girl I assume most of you came here for!
Oh, the bracelets. These big ol' things. They look harder to take off, but they really aren't. Oh, and the gloves are coming off too, don't worry!
Let me just get these bracelets off first, and then these gloves will come right off.
Some may ask, "But Kora! Why not take the bracelets off seperately?", and I say that it isn't as fun if I have to take off every little thing! Hey, ~player~, you agree, right?
Here we go again!
{i} Heeeeeeere's Kora! {!reset}
Can I blow your mind again? Let's find out!
I see a lot of cute outfits around, but I never really change unless I'm goofing off! What I've got is the cutest and fiercest outfit for me, and I love it!
Well, you're in luck then! I love small, cute things!

Well, like, Girl Power is usually just about how girly a girly girl can girl, but anyone who hates a cute tomboy definitely has bad taste! So, Kumatora, you most definitely, absolutely have Girl Power!
Well, I like the way you think! I'd be careful though--my love is like a million volts, hehe!
Well, it totally makes talking to strangers easier! Or even just talking to your friends! Can't just zap your friends when they disagree with you, that'd be, like, super rude!
Yeah, you're probably right. Unless your Moon Crystal is a bit red, then you're probably not a Blade. Mystery solved!
Well, it's definitely the easiest. It comes off in the front too, but it's waaaay easier to just make half of it disappear! I also just won't lose it...
Hehe, don't worry, they'll come off. Easily too! It's good to have a little fun is all!
Forget? Me? Never! Well, there was that one time-- no, that's not important. I just wanna look sexy is all, hehe!
Thanks, Estelle! I can't speak for every Blade, but it's definitely way more fun this way!

They better be, hehe! I've fought a lot of slimy creatures and weird little bird men, but showing off how cute and fierce I am to any other cuties is totally worth! My legs get a little tired though...
Great! Then we've totally got ourselves a solution! The elegeant and refined Kaz meets the cute and fierce Kora! That's definitely a story!
Oh, but Estelle! You're pretty nice too! How's your friend situation like?
Thanks, Heris! I may have enough energy to go around, but more chest is always appreciated, especially from you.
Welp, I haven't seen her here, so I guess not! For now, you're stuck with your Vivid Love, Kora!

state.text: Oooooooh, where do I even begin!? Okay, so, "y'all", is like, just a very easy but kinda cute way of addressing everyone-- it means "you guys"! Now that's just simple stuff you can use when shooting the breeze-- which means nattering-- which just meanst chatting! And and and, I always like to use little electric words to describe how pumped I am, like "sparking", or, y'know, just the word "electric"! You can also phrases related to your Core Crystal like, "I'm shaking to my core!" for extra emphasis on a situation-- oh, but, you're not a Blade, so I dunno how useful that'd be. I could go on longer, but those are all the ones packed tight in the brain-box right now-- oh, that one just means brain!

case.state: Oh, thanks! But, uh, Blades always work best with their Drivers, y'know! Teamwork makes the dream work, they say!
I've got plenty of flat-chested Blade friends! Besides, look who's talking about having big boobs, heh!
Ok, I wasn't paying too much attention but I'm sure everyone was like, "Wow, Kora, that was awesome! It was even better the second time!"
Whew! That was cool, wasn't it?
I definitely nailed it here!
Wha-bam! Skirt off!
Alright, it's off. Let's continue, 'kay?
Hips out! Don't go too crazy over just that, 'kay?
How was it? An exciting reveal, right!?
How was it? A 10/10 I hope!
A spectacular performance if I do say so myself! Oh, and I say so!
Tada! Kora at her most primal, for everyone to see! Good enough to write about, right?
Hehe, here I am! Think this is my ultimate form?
Get an eyeful, 'cuz I'm now in the nude! Fully too!

Y'know, talking my glove off like this reminds me of something. One time I was doing Sheba's makeup, cuz she asked right? Everything was fine, until I dropped something in her bathtub that she's always in. And I really mean always. Like, the tub flies and everything and she's quite literally always bathing. I don't think I've every seen her without it. So anyway, my makeup in there and I have to reach in there and get it while Sheba is worrying that I ruined her bath water. So I take off my glove and go in. I got it, but I saw her making a weird smirk when I was reaching. Makes me wonder if maybe she could, like, feel the water or something and I was touching her somewhere I shouldn't. Or maybe my boobs were just spilling, I dunno.
The gloves just came off! Oh, that's not me being upset or anything, I mean I literally just took off my gloves. Hope there wasn't any confusion on that part.
Not gonna lie, these gloves are super comfy. Sad to see 'em go, but a deal's a deal!
Well, that was easy! Let's keep going!
Babam! Kora is ready to roll!
That wasn't hard at all! I wanna play more, so let's start the next round already!
Woohoo, someone other than me lost! ~Name~ should start removing the big stuff!
Hehe, now that's what I'm talking about! Hey, ~name~, join me in nudity!
Woohoo, a guy gets to strip for me! Choose something great!
Oh, so ~name~ lost? Not me? Not that I thought I was gonna lose anyway, just-- y'know what, I'll just let him do his thing.
I almost feel bad for you, ~name~. Almost. This stripping game can be rough but it's definitely rewarding for everyone involved!
This could be good. Hope ~name~ lives up to my hopes!
I haven't even done anything special yet, and I'm not losing this round! Is this a good sign for our lovable Kora?
~Name~, it's okay to lose every once in a while! Just make your sure you take off something cool, got it?
Woot woot! Time to strip ~name~!
It's a guys turn! Surely he can make this worthwhile!
Whoa-ho, looks like it's your turn, ~name~! Watcha gonna take off?
Ah, boys will be boys and losers will be losers, but this time our loser is a boy! I have no idea where I'm going with this, so please strip something off already!
Someone else lost! Hope this means I'm getting better!

So, like, was you hand just bad, or didja play badly? 'Cuz, like, y'know, I'm not the best at this game either but I think sometimes the hands can just screw you, even if you do all the exchanging stuff right! I mean, I think I do it right, anyway. Oh oh, is there some sort of strategy to exchange better!? Maybe if we just ask the dealer nicely... Think that'd work, ~name~?
Even I get the teensiest bit embarassed when someone's staring at me... You didn't lose because you were busy looking at my glowy lines, right?
O-oh, you're ~name~? Mmm, show me a guy's charm...
Haah, you're up, ~name~... Got anything, ah, good for me?
You c-could really be helping me out here depending on, mmm, what you take off, ~name~...
I totally agree! Alrest definitely needs waaaaaaay more land! The Cloud Sea takes days to cross!
Whoa, Lucy's got a friend! Are they gonna play too?
Oooooooh, I am all ears! Fighting for a cool, just cause is totally awesome!
Huh? Where!? Point me to it, I'll zap it!
Language! Nah I'm kidding, say naughty words all ya want, I won't judge!

Y'know, ~name~, you remind me a bit of my friend, Sheba! She also wants a harem of cute girls, and you're both very high class! I bet you two would get along well--or does two girls with a harem spark competition?
Okay, whoever is drawing ANYONE like that have GOT to show me. That's way too incredible NOT to!
Hey, Barb, you've got a great singing voice! I wish I could sing like that! The best I can do is short chants!

~Name~, can I just say you have so much Girl Power!? Like, you're so fashionable, and cute, and fierce, and so much more! Oh, oh! And you're so tall! It so works for you, it really brings out this air of elegance. Hehe, maybe I should be calling you Ms. ~name~ instead!
Hey, hey! Box Girl! Myriam! You do, like, investigations and stuff, yeah? You must have all sorts of cool stories to share! Care to spill!? Pretty please!?
Oh! Hey, Myriam! You must have, like, some of the hottest scoops here in the Inventory! Lay it on me! I wanna here something juicy!
Sorry girl, but looks like you're up! Don't feel intimidated!
Can ~name~ show us her Girl Power? Trick question! Of course she can!

Okay, ~name~! Take whatever off with a bang! And maybe a kapow! Ooooh! Or maybe a hwacha!
I didn't lose! I mean, ~name~ lost! Hurray! For me anyway, sorry you had to lose, ~name~.
That's one more loss for you! Stay on your toes, ~name~, this card game is no joke!
Y'know, I may not be Sheba, but I do still have an affinity for girls. Can you show us something nice?
Woohoo! ~Name~'s gonna strip for us! This'll be good I hope!
Oooooooh, ~name~, got something good for us?
Hey, ~name~, if I hype you up, will you take something good off? Goooooooooooooo ~name~! Wooo!
Oho, now ~name~ is gonna strip! Watcha got, watcha got!?
Whatever ~name~ takes off, I'm sure it'll be great! Right? Right!
Oh, it's sad to see a cute outfit go. But go it must!
Let's see if the real charm of yours came from your outfit or you yourself! I mean, I'm sure you're the real star anyway, but clothes off is better in this type of game, right!?
Girl Power is an essential part of any girl! You've gotta show off for the rest of us, even if it's only for us girls!
Tough times for us ladies, huh? Least I know us girls can be trusted to give us a good strip, right?
A-ah, it's ~name~'s turn? Mmm, show me your Girl Power...
Haah, you're up, ~name~... Got anything, ah, good for me?
You c-could really be helping me out here depending on, mmm, what you take off, ~name~...
A tie!? That has to be like a 1 in a bajillion chance!
Guess we have to wait a bit longer for your big explosion then, huh?
I didn't think about guys having small items on them, mainly just girls. Would you say you care for being fashionable, ~name~?
Oh, so the ~clothing~! Was wondering if you were gonna take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off.
Only the ~clothing~? A bit lame, but we're progressing!
More power to ~name~, but it's kinda sad to see good ~clothing~ go. Totally boosted your overall look, ~name~!
Well, this wasn't a humdinger of a round, but we can at least appreciate what ~name~ was wearing, right?
I'm hanging loose and you're just now taking off the ~clothing~, ~name~? C'mon, be a little considerate!
Ahh, boo! When's the better stuff being taken off, ~name~!?
A small item? I mean, whatever, we're moving along.
At least this'll be a quick round, right?
I'm all for seeing more fashionable guys! Though I guess you're losing part of that fashion now...
Can you make taking something like ~clothing~ off fierce? Go on, impress me!
J-just the ~clothing~? ...Not helpful...
Oh, I thought... ah, nevermind...
That sounds like a dream come true, Deimos! Finding an outfit that matches your fierce look is definitely super fun!
You're just full of surprises! Two pairs of underwear!? If I wore underwear in the first place, I'd totally kick my self for not thinking about that!
When you take off something good, ~name~, I'll rejoice. 'Til then: booo!
Maybe we'll have more fun next round.
Oh, oh, like, we can use this time now to decide on what to talk about! How about... favorite food-- no! Favorite place to get food? Nah, I'll come up with something better later!
The only sad part about this game is seeing all the good stuff go! ...Maybe this round wasn't the best example, but, like, you get my point, yeah?
So, ~name~, you're gonna do something big soon, right? Small thing to big thing is a good way to go!
Let's just move on.
Surely we'll get something better next round, right?
Next round, please!
I'll still cheer for y'all even if you take off these small things! I'm a natural born cheerleader, woohoo!
Optimism is all about thinking there are better things to come. And I wouldn't say I'm a pessimist, so, I'm excited for later, hehe!
We'll whittle you down, ~name~. From cards to just standing around being sexy, we'll get you to take something big off!
When you take off something good, ~name~, I'll rejoice. 'Til then: booo!
Maybe we'll have more fun next round.
Oh, oh, like, we can use this time now to decide on what to talk about! How about... favorite food-- no! Favorite place to get food? Nah, I'll come up with something better later!
The only sad part about this game is seeing all the good stuff go! ...Maybe this round wasn't the best example, but, like, you get my point, yeah?
So, ~name~, you're gonna do something big soon, right? Small thing to big thing is a good way to go!
Ngh, I'll just go on without proper sustance. Thanks ~name~!
Y-you'll take off something better next time, right? Ah...
*gasp* What a tease! Devilish behavior!
Whoa! The cute butterfly is actually super cute girl! Now that's a shocker!
Whoa! Guess I won't be the only one transforming today!
Whoa! Guess I'm not the only one to transform today!
Whoa, ghost friend! Er, it is a friend, right?
Oh, Nami, you dropped something.
What? That's just plain dumb! Don't you know how much space the Cloud Sea takes up? Too much! WAY too much! Like, how am I supposed to rest my legs if there's nowhere to sit on?
You're really taking off ~clothing~ like that? But ~clothing.ifPlural(they look|it looks)~ so good on you!
You still have little things to take off after showing your tits? Wild choice!
Whoa, you're practically naked and you still wanna take off small things? Anything to not lose, I guess!
You think there's enough chests out in the field or something? Don't be shy, I don't have a monoply on bare boobs.
It's hard to think of a good story when your opponents only take off little things! Have a heart, ~name~!
I'll be honest, I lost a bit of patience taking off my own clothes. That being said, you should {i} totally{!reset} come down to my level!
Oh, you're gonna take off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~? Alright, but be warned, you may feel naked without them! I still miss my bolts...
Teeny tiny things give teeny tiny satisfaction! Guess you've gotta lose more to see good stuff from you.
Even just losing the small things means we'll see bigger things later. I can wait.
Well, if ~name~ is just gonna take off something small, I guess it's still better than me myself losing. So thanks anyway, ~name~!
Y-you'll take off something better next time, right? Ah...
Aw, help a girl out, why don't you? Nn...
We'll see bigger things from ~name~ later, I suppose. I can hardly wait.
Just the ~clothing~? I guess that saves me from losing, so I'll allow it this time, ~name~!
A small step toward greatness! Still a little disappointing that you're only taking off the ~clothing~, but I'll work with it!
Seeing ~clothing~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ being taken off stings a little, but in the grand scheme of strip poker, it's not too big of a loss!
Accessories are all about boosting a girl's charm! Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(look|looks)~ super awesome by the way!
I don't know what the fashion is like where you come from, but ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ you've got there totally show off great taste!
Great change! An exposed midrriff like that is the perfect way to show off your cute side!
Well, my clothes kinda just disappear. I don't have any reason to just let them stick around, so they go poof!
Ooooh, this reminds me of how my friends also had a large bounty on their heads at one point! You seem super nice, so I'll trust that you're not a bad guy for the time being, okay?
Moving right along!
Let's just start the next round.
Dealer, start shuffling that deck!
I can still be peppy after an okay showing! Just watch me!
But hey, if you're one item down, that's still good for the rest of us! Thanks for taking one for the team!
The fun'll start sometime soon, I bet!
~Name~'s just gotta get taken down some more is all! Good luck, you're gonna need it, girl!
Keep it going!
I'll still cheer for y'all even if you take off these small things! I'm a natural born cheerleader, woohoo!
With your ~clothing~ gone, I almost don't want you to strip off anything else! Though, dismantling a cute outfit to see a cuter body is definitely worth it!

Some people may have told me that wearing small items like ~clothing~ may be impractical out on the field. But, like, you've gotta look good in all of your accessories while beating your enemies, right?
Well, that wasn't fruiful.
Mmm, maybe the thought of ~name~ taking off the bigger things would help...
That does sound like fun! I could definitely do one of these "microgame" thingies. I think.
Shoes are an important part of your everyday life! Not only do they have to, like, y'know, take you everywhere, but they also have to look totally awesome! And that's why I wear heels everywhere!
Now THIS is what the Inventory was made for! Keep at it, ~name~!
That's the stuff! This is starting to get real exciting!
Oh? The ~clothing~? Now we're talkin'!
Oh, something like this is good! No one can be too too mad-- ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ small, but not insignificant! Great choice, ~name~!
The ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~... decent. Not super exciting, but, like, we're getting there!
We're getting just a little bit closer to being on equal terms. Hope you're ready, ~name~!
Hey, so about your ~clothing~: do most guys wear that kinda thing where you came from? ~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ looks nice!
~Clothing~'s coming off! ~Name~, you're doing great!
Go go go! The faster your ~clothing~ is off, the faster we get to see you take something else off too!
There's no need for hasty moves-- I've learned enough on the field to know you've gotta wait your turn in battle. So, let's just wait for something even more exciting from ~name~.
Be a tease while you still can, ~name~-- your layers aren't infinite!
...~Clothing~? Nn, keep it coming, ~name~...
Oho, we're, mm, getting somewhere!
Aw, you look so cute without them! Is it so bad you can't keep them off for just a little longer?
Oooooh, I love hugs! I'll take you up on that!
On one hand, I am soooooo naked right now. On the other, free hug! I'll have to think on this...
Hey, ~name~, you're good, right? If you're ready, we're ready!
Now that your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ is off, ~name~, we should try to get you to lose more hands. You'd be a great addition to my story!
Don't start sweating, now, ~name~! We're just getting started!
There's still much more excitement to be had, and no time for breaks! Let's keep going!
~Name~, you can still try to be bolder and fiercer with your next strips! You could do that for me, right? Right!?
~Clothing~? Off. ~Name~? Just a little more naked than before! Next round? About to start!
The next round should be even more awesome! Right, ~name~?
I wanna see more of ~name~. Next round please!
A quick and easy round! I like it!
There's not much else to savor here. I think we're good to move on!
There's only so much we could gawk at now that ~name~'s ~clothing~ is gone. More cards, please!
Ah, just seeing more of ~name~ helps a lot!
H-how about we continue? Nnn, I wanna see more...
Aww, Shantae is even smaller and cuter now! ...Would you be offended if I pat you on the head!?
Your Soul Gem reminds me of my Core Crystal! You sure you're not a Blade?
That was all makeup!? Tell me who you've been going to get something like that so convincing!

If you're really a zombie, you seem pretty nice! I don't really have a brain for zombies to get at, but it's good for ~player~ and everyone else! ...Wait, by not having a brain, I meant--oh, forget it...
I'd totally just zap 'em! Hit 'em with a "zing", and they'd totally just go "kerplow"!
Aha, we're getting a little spicy here! Even just taking off the ~clothing~ is a bit lewd, don't ya think, ~player~?
Just a little bit of ~name~ gets us a little bit closer to seeing a lot... bit of... ~name~. I flubbed that sentence, but go ~name~, woot woot!
The ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off! Glad to see something somewhat big come off you!
Didja think only stripping your ~clothing~ would keep me down? I'll put a positive spin on it, just you watch!
Well, I can totally see the merit in something small like ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~, ~name~. It just, like, gets a bit more spicier when more things come off, right?
~Name~, before you take your ~clothing~ off, I just wanna say that ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ super cute!
~Name~, it's a bit sad to see your ~clothing~ go, but I think you'll look better without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
The ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off! ~Name~, you're doing great!
